sentences.sContent: If only I knew my new headmaster!
sentences.sContent_eng: If only I knew my new headmaster!
sentences.sCn: 要是我认识我的新校长就好了！

sentences.sContent: Allow me to introduce you to our headmaster.
sentences.sContent_eng: Allow me to introduce you to our headmaster.
sentences.sCn: 请允许我介绍你见见我们的校长。

sentences.sContent: She sends all her earnings except those for her to live on to headmaster.
sentences.sContent_eng: She sends all her earnings except those for her to live on to headmaster.
sentences.sCn: 她将自己的收入除去生活费之后，全部寄给了校长。

trans.tranOther: a male teacher who is in charge of a school
